title.narrative: 1.3:QUALITY AND INCLUSIVE EARLY-LEARNING

description.narrative: Early learning institutions at the national level and in priority districts and regions offer quality and inclusive learning opportunities in a protective and clean environment for the preparation of primary school entry to children aged 3 to 5 years., which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Early Childhood Development (Covid), Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Learning Outcomes, Learning Outcomes (Covid), Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Young girls and boys (0â€“5 years), particularly the most deprived and hard-to-reach, are immunized, well nourished, healthy, protected, registered at birth and prepared for school, including in humanitarian situations.
